title: NeNe Leakes and Kim Zolciak return to RHOA for season 10
title_page: NeNe Leakes and Kim Zolciak return to RHOA for season 10 | Daily Mail Online
text:
They skyrocketed to fame thanks to their tumultuous relationship on Real Housewives of Atlanta.
And now NeNe Leakes and Kim Zolciak's return to the hit show is one step closer to fruition as they have reportedly reached negotiation stages.
The former Glee actress, 49, and the Don't Be Tardy star, 38, have both been offered deals to return to the Bravo show for its impending season 10, sources claim.
Scroll down for video
Bakc again? NeNe Leakes, 49, (right) and Kim Zolciak, 38, (left, in 2014) are reportedly set to return to The Real Housewives Of Atlanta as they have reportedly reached negotiation stages
According to TMZ, the show's producers are keen for the frenemies to return as full-time cast members.
But since leaving the show both stars have found huge success in their individual careers and will subsequently have to fit filming into their very busy schedules.
NeNe is currently working on hit shows such Fashion Police, meanwhile Kim has her own reality TV show, Don't Be Tardy.
But if Bravo are serious about re-signing the fan favourites they may have to attach big figures, as Kim has recently confessed that she is 'motivated by money'.
Reunited? The former Glee actress and the Don't Be Tardy star (here together in 2015) are said to be in talks to return to the Real Housewives of Atlanta for the upcoming season 10, according to TMZ
Here come the girls! NeNe has been sharing an array of snaps with her former RHOA co-stars, proving that their relationships are back on track
While leaving LAX airport earlier this month, the blonde beauty told photographers: 'I'm motivated by money, definitely motivated by money,'.
Back in September, NeNe told People that she turned down an offer to return to the hit reality show after drawn-out negotiations with the network for the current season nine.
'I heard once they couldn't work their deal out with me, they went to Kim Zolciak,' the Broadway actress said.
'When we couldn't work the deal out on me making appearances, then they went to Kim to work the same thing, I suppose,' she snubbed. 'I'm assuming she took it.'
Dramatic: NeNe and Kim's tumultuous relationship played out on the hit Bravo during their five seasons together on the show
Host Jeremy Parsons called out the New Normal alum, 'Turn the lights up because the shade is really thick in here!'
'No! I'm just telling you the truth!' NeNe protested. 'That is not shade. That is real.'
When asked how she felt about the possibility of the Don't Be Tardy star returning for season nine, she confessed: 'I think it's going to be really odd. Kim hadn't been around the show for a while. It's going to be odd having Kim back.'
'But I think the fans want to see her though,' she admitted.
Kim and NeNe started out on season one as best friends but had a fierce falling out, including moments they came to blows, when they repeatedly screamed 'f*** you!' at one another, and both swearing their friendship was done for good.
Former besties: The ladies were great gal pals during the beginning of the series before their fierce falling out
But the ladies claimed to have mended their friendship during a 2014 appearance together on Watch What Happens Live.
They revealed their feud was behind them and NeNe also admitted that her biggest regret was when she screamed at Kim: 'Close your legs to married men!'
Of her tears at looking back on their falling out, NeNe said: 'Kim and I have come so far - those clips were horrible! It's been years and we've just come so far.'
Asked what helped repair the relationship, the two original Real Housewives Of Atlanta cast members insisted it was merely 'time.'
'Time heals wounds': NeNe and Kim claimed to have mended their friendship during a 2014 appearance together on Watch What Happens Live
'Time heals wounds,' she said, blaming the actual falling out on the 'stress' of the show and 'other people chiming in with their stinky opinions.'
Meanwhile, the Dancing With The Stars alum made a cameo in a recent trailer for the second half of season nine of RHOA.
Kim - who was last seen in season five - returns to the series and is seen in a heated argument with Kenya Moore.
Grand entrance! Meanwhile, in a recent RHOA trailer for the second half of season nine Kim makes a guest appearance during Shereé Whitfield's Chateau Shereé party
Under fire: The blonde bombshell, who is married to former Atlanta Falcons football player Kroy Biermann, comes under the target of Kenya Moore
The blonde bombshell, who is married to former Atlanta Falcons football player Kroy Biermann, comes under the target of Kenya.
She makes her grand entrance during Shereé Whitfield's Chateau Shereé party and in the confrontational clip Kenya says: 'Your husband doesn’t have a job right now, so worry about that.'
'B****, you want to be me,' Kim retorts. 'You want to have a baby, you can’t. You want to have a man, you f***ing don’t. Bye.'
Kenya, 46, gets the final word in by poking fun at the mother-of-six's face as she said: 'I know I'm not a duck like your lips.'
